Uses of Class
io.atomix.resource.ResourceType

  • Packages that use ResourceType 
    Package Description
    io.atomix
    Core Atomix APIs, including AtomixClient and AtomixReplica.
    io.atomix.collections
    Provides distributed collections such as DistributedMap DistributedMultiMap, DistributedQueue, and DistributedSet.
    io.atomix.coordination
    Provides distributed coordination resources such as DistributedLock and DistributedLeaderElection, DistributedMembershipGroup, io.atomix.coordination.DistributedMessageBus for unreliable messaging, and io.atomix.coordination.DistributedTopic for publish-subscribe messaging.
    io.atomix.messaging  
    io.atomix.resource
    Provides classes and interfaces for creating and operating on Raft replicated state machines.
    io.atomix.variables
    Provides distributed variables such as DistributedValue and DistributedLong.

    • Uses of ResourceType in io.atomix

      Methods in io.atomix with parameters of type ResourceType 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends Resource>
      CompletableFuture<T>      		 Atomix.create(String key, ResourceType<T> type)
      Creates a new instance for the given resource.
      <T extends Resource>
      CompletableFuture<T>      		 Atomix.get(String key, ResourceType<T> type)
      Gets or creates the given resource and acquires a singleton reference to it.
      <T extends Resource>
      CompletableFuture<Set<String>>      		 Atomix.keys(ResourceType<T> type)
      Returns the keys of existing resources belonging to a resource type.
